message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $18,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $18,000 is too high. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
